## Accurate Degrees of Freedom

$$
\nu = \frac{
\left(
\frac{s_1^2}{n_1} + \frac{s_2^2}{n_2}
\right)^2
}{
\frac{\left(\frac{s_1^2}{n_1}\right)^2}{n_1-1} + \frac{\left(s_2^2/n_2\right)^2}{n_2-1}
}
$$
